text: Mititaiagimene Young Vivian (born 12 November 1935) is a Niuean politician. He was the premier of Niue twice. He lost his re-election to Toke Talagi in 2008."Talagi declared new Niue premier", ABC Radio Australia, 19 June 2008 ==References== Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:Premiers of Niue
title: Young Vivian
